name: Shirley Nicholson
text: Man was very helpful got what I went there for

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to review our store.  We appreciate your business.

name: Charles Santucci
text: Great place for mobile home needs and Great customer service

resp.text: Thank you for your business and we look forward to working with you again soon.

name: Kenneth Moody
text: Perfect place for specific mobile home parts. A little pricey on some things but worth it when you need a specialty part.

resp.text: Thank you.  We take pride in the quality we offer and are happy to see that you appreciate it! See you soon.

name: Mike Anderson
text: I have been looking for a mobile home part's place, Blevins had just what I needed. price is not bad.

resp.text: Come back anytime, we are here to help.

name: Tracy Mizell
text: They had the new bathtub I needed and was quick and sufficient, very friendly

resp.text: We are glad we could help. Visit us anytime.

name: Teri Pierce
text: This is a great company! I’ve shopped with them many times as a private customer. All of the staff are very helpful and courteous. In particular Buddy went out of his way to help me get what I needed.

name: Shelly Bozeman
text: Great place to get supplies and Wayne is an Awsome staff.

resp.text: Thank you for your business and we look forward to seeing you soon.

name: rj creal
text: The guys at the parts counter are Great  an  know there stuff . If you own a manufactured home. I highly recommend getting your  parts hers. Rhey have everthing.

name: Lena Lyons
text: Danny & Buddy are always so helpful! The best ever!

name: Veronica McIntyre
text: If you’re a female, don’t go here. Customer Service was absolutely terrible. The guy was rude and made out like me and my mother was stupid. The maturity level was low as well.

name: Alan Mothershed
text: Always helpful and have what I needed

name: deep south Diesel cowboy
text: Exilent staff called ahead with my order when I got there they were ready

name: Gary Pearcy
text: If you need anything for a manufactured home they have it.

name: Mike Hayes
text: Great

name: LAND HARRINGTON
text: Dont know, wasn't there

name: Brandon Tillman
text: Danny & Buddy are the best!!!

name: Michelle Sanders
text: Friendly helpful

name: Buddy Evans
text: Great service

name: Tom White
text: Great experience

name: Ann Abbitt
text: Bad customer service

name: Busy Bee
text: Thanks Danny!

name: Warthaddous Morris
text: Danny's is a GREAT place to get whatever you need. They aren't as Spacious as Home Depot or Lowes. They may not have as many different brands to choose from. But what they do have is a quality item at a reasonable price. If you account for your fuel and time spent I would say you are probably saving $$$ 99% of the time there over the bigger stores. Besides, you don't have to look up and down 14 aisles to find someone that can have someone else paged to assist you in the plumbing section. Which you are now 14 aisles away from. Help is close and with a little patience, easy to find. The staff at Danny's is always willing to go that extra mile to help make your day or task easier if you just give them the chance.

name: Georgia Mcrae
text: Great people and great prices! They treat you like family! Will definitely do the drive instead of big box store shopping! Support local small business!

name: Scott Wooldridge
text: Always very helpful and friendly. Everything you'd expect from "Southern Hospitality." Been coming here for years and will continue to commerce here as a first choice to any hardware needs that arise.

name: Night Owl
text: The most informative and helpful hardware store I've been in. Also,  very reasonable prices.

name: Randy Mikles
text: Great place to buy whatever you need, fast and friendly service

name: Diana
text: Everything and anything you need.  Often difficult to get assistance bc so busy. Always friendly

name: Tracey Bishop
text: Very knowledgeable owners and workers. The prices are very reasonable. Thankful for all they do for our community.

name: Angel Adams
text: They got what you need! Very friendly and helpful employees! Its a  fun run when I go there

name: Dennis Peek
text: Danny's has better prices than Lowe's on almost every item I have checked, I've called both places and compared prices many times and Danny's will be lower 99 out of 100 times. I don't check anymore I just go to Danny's. 👍👍👍👍👍

name: Bruce Hampton
text: Very helpful, best place in the area and cheaper than driving to Rome or Gadsden

name: Gary Bonds
text: Best place within 100 miles....customer service is 5 ☆☆☆☆☆ all the way....

name: Greg Thomas
text: Should’ve read the comments and reviews.  I think New management would be a good thing. Ended up going down the road to another local hardware store and was greeted and helped the minute I walked in. For a hometown store you don’t seem to care about the people who pay your bills.

resp.text:
Well sorry you were having a bad day
We still will take car of you
You shouldn’t have just walked out tried too help but you left
Thanks again

name: Angela Parker
text: Older gentleman was somewhat rude to me when I asked for help. Everyone seemed more interested in talking at the counter rather than what I was needing help with. I eventually left and went to another hardware store to get what I needed.

resp.text:
Sorry for your bad feeling
But that’s how the store runs come to the counter and we will help you don’t butt in front of people that are getting helped

name: bert day
text: Great service an always been a great help on what i needed

name: James Miller
text:
Needed help finding clear tubing.... was pointed in the general direction. The roll for the size I needed was empty and I asked if they had anymore in the back. I was told “what you see is what we’ve got”.
Low and behold I raised my head and looked on the top of a near by shelf and found a brand new roll of the size I needed. I managed to reach it and asked if I could have some cut to my desired length. With an attitude the helper agreed and seemed like I had annoyed him for even asking.
I guess if they don’t know you then your best driving a little further To get what you need.
The price was fair but that was definitely overshadowed by the lack of willingness to help a customer find what I was looking for.

resp.text:
Sorry you felt that way
Sometimes we get overwhelmed and somewhat short

name: David Lary
text: Danny's is an ICON around here.  If Danny's doesn't have it you may have to drive a ways to find it.  The staff here is helpful and friendly.  They can get busy sometimes so be patient.

name: Greg Poos
text: Good people, good prices.

name: Dewayne Whitton
text: Needed a water heater and left with a 40 gallon for $290. It works great!

name: Stephen Powers
text: I like it it was one stop shopping the people were helpful and friendly will go there again whenever I need Hardware or whatever

name: Suz Mor
text: Great Hardware store and "much more".  You can find pretty much whatever you need there and the folks there are very helpful and friendly.

name: Steve Brock
text: Great place to do business staff is nice and always willing to help with materials and questions

name: Dolly Gazaway
text: Danny's is a great place. Friendly, helpful, and just great customer service. Thanks guys.

text: My papa just went in Danny is so so so so helpful and  so so so friendly. This place is very very very awesome

resp.text: Thanks for stopping in , hurry back

name: Branson Locklear
text: I found what I was looking for with out any wast of time.

name: Donna Kling
text: Not very helpful. Maybe it was because I was not a local to the town. Didn't seem to have anything I needed and that is where the electric company sent me to get the right stuff.

resp.text: What were you trying too do?????

name: Jack Personette
text: Very nice 👍 place to deliver to, people are very friendly

name: Sam Light

name: Ronnie Taylor
text: MFG,HOUSING SUPPLIER

name: Niecy armstrong
text: Hands down this is the place to shop for your home.  Knowledgeable service and awesomely friendly. I’ve been shopping here for years and I really enjoy their expertise. They are on point and get you what you need quick fast and and hurry. Recommend these guys to everyone. Thanks for your awesome 👏🏽 service. You are the best!!!

name: Victor Staples
text: Everything we were looking for, they had it. knowledgeable and great service to mobile home needs.

name: Juanita Grooms
text: If they don't have A part for your MH it will be there the next day,only place I shop for all my needs,great folks!!

name: Terry Lynn Eddins

name: Devorna Skiba
text: I love the family that owns this place. They go out their way to help you.

text: Great place to shop for mobile home Parts.

name: Joshua Creasman
text: Great ppl and super nice

name: Linda Ingram
text: Have called multiple times been promised calls would be returned. Was first tolded that he would look this weekend but the never heard back. O guess they don't need the work.

name: Porkchopranch
text: Good people. Didnt have what I needed but they did order it for me.

name: Jim Powell
text: Bought our first home here 34 year's ago still great people!

name: D R
text: Paul will take great care of you.

name: El Guapo
text: Old man that runs it it is good people.

name: Tammy Gray
text: Good to look at Mobile homes

name: Harold Blythe
text: Friendly guy willing to waste time with me will be back

name: Mandi Lemley
text: Too bad there’s not a zero star rating! Bob Pope is terrible. In the process of moving my dad’s mobile home he used my sister as one of his moving crew, threw the AC unit in the back of HER truck and scratched it up in the process of pulling it out, sent her to Lowe’s to purchase the cinder block for the trailer to sit on, after having the blocks delivered he STOLE the unused blocks that SHE PAID FOR and she planned to build a fire pit with, left skirting and trash all over the front and back yard, NEVER reconnected his AC, water or plumbing and my sister had to pay someone else to come do those things AND he left my dad in a very dangerous situation with his mobile home only having FOUR tether straps and by CODE he is supposed to have TEN tether straps! Bob Pope Mobile Home Movers (Bob Pope himself)  required payment up front and not only did not finish the job, but he also stole building materials from the property, but he conveniently left the busted or broken cinder block! TERRIBLE!!! DISHONEST!!! THIEF!!! I DO NOT RECOMMEND BOB POPE TO ANYONE!! This occurred 2/29/21! We are in the process of taking him to small claims court and have filed a report with the County and State of Alabama.

name: Gene Dockery
text: Mobile home moving at it's best.

name: KRISTY MYERS
text: Bob and his crew did an amazing job for us!  Reasonable rates, efficient and great work.  Good ole' fashion honesty and hard work is the best way to describe them!  Thank you Bob!

name: Carmen
text: That did a wonderful job moving our mobile I would recommend them to anyone best prices your going to find!

name: Denise Nevin
text: I wouldnt trust no other Trailer Moving Service other than Bobs Mibile Home Service they are the best and work their butts off to make a customer satisfied

name: david Williams
text: Good old fashioned

name: VaNessa Ramirez
text:
(Translated by Google) Eehh

(Original)
Eehh

name: Jeff Mooneyham
text: used them several time while my daughter is in Auburn....always did a great job!.....very reasonable....great work!

name: Andria Spates
text: I have used them multiple times and have not been disappointed. Excellent service and communication.

name: michele saxton
text: Rob was very helpful they had exactly what we needed it's easy to find

name: Dawn Smith
text: I highly recommend Rob and his team . They do exceptional work. They are always so nice and professional. Rob is extremely nice. I can't thank him enough for all his help.

name: Karen H
text: We have had a mobile home for our children at AU for many years and have received great service from Rob Burt. Thank you!

name: Jeff Benson
text: Did several projects for me. Always very reasonable and dependable.

name: Benjamin Pollock
text: Rob has come to my residence on a few occasions now and the work that he does is absolutely exceptional. His service is outstanding and he is a very down to Earth guy. I highly recommend!

name: Neal Laye
text: I called Mr. Rob at 7:45 a.m. and by 8:10 his techs were on the job. The techs were very professional, explained to me the problem and the repairs made. Very reasonable prices and easy to pay online through the pay app. I will recommend MHS to anyone in need of reliable and honest repair service.

name: Gary Harlow
text: We’ve called Rob on several occasions and he has always done a good job even going the extra mile. Would highly recommend.

name: Jacob Alvey
text: A limb fell on my mobile home and put a hole in the roof. After a communication issue Mobile home service did the job perfectly. Thank you.

name: Jon H
text: had a problem getting in touch at first. but once i did, they did a fantastic job. this is the 3rd call ive made to them over the past 7 years. have always been a great experience

name: Andrew Swann
text: I had them come out and fix a blower motor on my air conditioner. He did an excellent job at a super reasonable price. I would definitely recommend.

name: Tammy Bauer
text: Roy goes above and beyond the call of duty to help fix problems with my kids' air conditioner at their trailer.    He is always available and can get to them in a speedy time frame.    He is very reasonably priced and very professional.  Highly recommend using Roy.

name: Mitchell Ward
text: Ten years ago I started doing business with Rob and Mobile Home Service when our first child was a student at Auburn University. Through our second and now our third child at Auburn University, this company has never let us down. We live too far away to be able to fix things that can go wrong. It is a great comfort to know that when those problems come up, all I have to do is call Rob and things are fixed very fast and fixed the right way! I never have to worry or make a several hour trip to Auburn on the spur of the moment. We are very thankful for this business!!

name: jared walker
text: Great company with fair and honest prices. I've used them for several things and have always been satisfied with the work they do.

name: Carmyn Wozniak
text: The skirting for my trailer got ripped off during high winds and they came early the next day and fixed it in less then 15 minutes! They were kind and very efficient!

name: Jackie Blaschke
text: They do great work, and good prices. They are extremely nice and go out of their way to help you.

name: Georgia Daly
text: I had a minor leak in my trailer and knowing nothing about trailers I panicked. I called Mobile Home Service Center and they were wonderful! I had no idea what I was going to do. Rob and Jeannie were so patient and understanding with me. They helped me resolve the issue and not to mention it was reasonably priced! Their service goes above and beyond. As a student living in Auburn who can’t call mom and dad, do yourself a favor and call them.

name: David Parola
text: Wow, I called Rob late on a Thursday about needing a consultation for some work I am doing and he came out the very next morning!  Very professional and he pointed out things I would never had thought of.  I won’t go anywhere else for any work that I need done!

name: Ben Gilder
text: Rob does great work. Couldn't ask for better service.

name: Amy Davis
text: Any time I have needed anything, Mobile Home Service Center has been there to help. It’s reassuring to know they can tackle just about any issue that may arise. They are very reasonable with prices as well.

name: Karen Mcelroy
text:
We have used This company for several things
We live out of town and can trust them to fix any of our small and large mobile home needs.
They are always prompt and excellent job at a reasonable price.

name: Lashawn Melton
text: I had an issue with a cracked garden tub and who I was going to go to for the repairs was not a hard decisions as they have always provided A1 services. They were speedy and efficient and I highly recommended

name: Anna White
text: They replaced my water heater and did an amazing job! Great customer service. Definitely would suggest them over anyone around!

name: RaeLeigh Baldwin
text: I had a run in with a dead animal up under my trailer and called Mobile Home Service Center and they came that afternoon and removed the animal and fixed the hole where the dead animal got up under my trailer from. Super nice, professional, and reasonably priced!

name: J Mattox
text: They were super responsive and corrected my Plumbing leak within minutes of the call.  Fast, professional and reasonable service. Will definitely use again.

name: Amy Hansen
text: Rob was extremely helpful and went out of his way to get a replacement part for my toilet. Will definitely be coming back for future trailer needs!

name: Mark King
text: Great service, great price and great people.

name: Auburn Realty
text:
I am so happy that I found Mobile Home Service Center to do repairs for
the rental property needs we have.  They are absolutely awesome.

name: Teddy Railey
text: As always everything Mobile Home Service Center does is a job that could not have been better and at a price that could not be better.

name: Nichole Murdock
text: The Mobile Home Service Center has been an absolute blessing! They are the friendliest of people and have helped me so much. I have been without air for about two weeks now and I tried working with another company but they never came out or gave me an estimate for a new system. I contacted the MHSC on Wednesday at 8 am and told him my dilemma and they said they would be out here Thursday morning to replace my entire unit and gave me an estimate right then and there. They were here at 8:20 this morning (earlier than my appointment time) and they fixed everything! Not only with my air but they are replacing my front door as well! Very Very Affordable. Very quick. Very friendly. And they guarantee their work. I will 100% go to them for everything from now on!

name: Sonya Addison
text: Great people!! I love there work!

name: Irene W620
text: They came straight over... fix 2 leaks at a very reasonable  price..I will be calling them in the future...

name: Luke Johnson
text: Great guys and they are not over priced. Highly recommend!

name: bopeep610
text: Wonderful experience..willing to help..I recommend this place of business!!! Please give them a visit.

name: M Stevens
text: Highly recommended. They do good work at good prices.

name: Chennan Xue
text: Rob is honest and helpful. God bless you, sir!

name: JOSHUA BROWN
text: Prices are way too high. They quoted me a price of $30 on a roll of strapping that cost $10 . Alexandria mobile home & Rv supply was $15 on the exact same item. So you definitely want to go to Alexandria mobile home and Rv supply in Alexandria instead of this place.

name: trip kerr
text: Great and understanding people and great service

name: Hillary Stepka
text: Had to order what I needed (shutters) but super easy to get done and the service was great!!! The mobile home parts store closest to me in Ashville closed so this will be my new go-to place for what I need. Thank you!!!

name: Fran Castleberry
text: Nice folks,got what u need.

name: Jerry Douglas
text: Had everything we needed. A big thank you.

name: Dale Miller
text: Found plumbing parts I needed at  Freedom Living Mobile Homes today.  The task will be easy now.

name: Vicky Caldwell
text: A good assortment of mobile home parts.

name: Alabama Cowboy
text: Very good and outstanding service had exactly what I was looking for

name: Andy Befort
text: Way to expensive!

name: Johnnie Lynne
text: Had the door that I wanted in stock

resp.text: Glad we had what you needed. Come shop with us anytime. Have a blessed 4th

name: Fannie Stockdale
text: It was fair

name: Michelle A`
text: Freedom Living Mobile Homes

resp.text: Hi Michelle thanks for a 5 star review we appreciate the time you took to review us.

name: Belinda Hutchinson
text: Too Expensive

resp.text: Sorry to hear, however we are always getting in new products and supplies and we are fairly priced for the industry. Hope to see you again soon!

name: Tamara Taylor
text: A bit pricey because they have the Monopoly in Talladega

resp.text: Hi Tamara, Thank you for the review, we do our best to provide the highest quality products and services.

name: Philip gardner
text: They were great and very good on everything especially on installation

name: Dawn Trainer
text:
Absolutely WONDERFUL!!! We had an old, damaged door and needed a new one. On the old one we had a key-less lock on it which was a pain to put on however, when we got the new door, Thomas made sure to transfer that lock onto the new one and it works better than ever (it did not work well on the old one because it was warped and broken).

Thomas is the owner. He is a kind, humble, southern gentleman. His mom and wife must be very proud of his trustworthy character.   He is a man with obvious love for his family and integrity that shines through his work.  We need more gentleman Thomas in this world. It would make it a better place.

My husband and I will never go anywhere else for our home repair needs.

name: Lona Bows
text: Small family store. If they ain't got it, they can get it.

name: Sean Coley
text: An awesome place to get part an supplies ez an convenient an friendly

name: Randu Williams
text: Good friend people service you

name: Carthell Green
text: Great good business

name: Danny Mitchell
text: Helped me get my shower facet fixed, thanks
